author: iwarnes3
title: Coldplay to take the Brits by storm as they’re announced to perform at ceremony where they’re nominated for several awards
text:
TV Magazine and the night was all yellow Coldplay to take the Brits by storm as they’re announced to perform at ceremony where they’re nominated for several awards 
The band will join Katy Perry and Ed Sheeran as last major act to sign up for the biggest night in UK music tomorrrow Exclusive FROM DAN WOOTTON'S BIZARRE COLUMN 21st February 2017, 7:00 pm
